description: Updates the EBS storage associated with MSK brokers.

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the cluster.

parameters.name: CurrentVersion
parameters.description: The version of cluster to update from. A successful operation will then generate a new version.

parameters.name: TargetBrokerEBSVolumeInfo
parameters.description: Describes the target volume size and the ID of the broker to apply the update to. (dict) --- Specifies the EBS volume upgrade information. The broker identifier must be set to the keyword ALL. This means the changes apply to all the brokers in the cluster. The ID of the broker to update. ProvisionedThroughput (dict) --- EBS volume provisioned throughput information. Enabled (boolean) --- Provisioned throughput is enabled or not. VolumeThroughput (integer) --- Throughput value of the EBS volumes for the data drive on each kafka broker node in MiB per second. VolumeSizeGB (integer) --- Size of the EBS volume to update.

nested_params.name: KafkaBrokerNodeId
nested_params.description: The ID of the broker to update.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Provisioned throughput is enabled or not.

nested_params.name: VolumeThroughput
nested_params.description: Throughput value of the EBS volumes for the data drive on each kafka broker node in MiB per second.

nested_params.name: VolumeSizeGB
nested_params.description: Size of the EBS volume to update.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster operation.
